summary:
This mod allows you to get more toes from a slain giant. I mean, what kind of person only takes one?
Choose from 3 versions - 2, 5, and 10 toes!
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to get more toes from a slain giant. I mean, what kind of person only takes one?

Three versions included - 2 toes, 5 toes, and 10 toes. 2 toes is the most logical one, as the \"Giant\'s Toe\" looks like the big toe, so you get a toe from each foot.

-Installation-
Manual:Download the file, choose 1 version, and drop it into skyrim/data folder. Activate it like any other mod.
NMM:Download, install it, deactivate the .esp that you do not need, leaving the one you need.

-To Uninstall-
Just delete the .esp file from skyrim/data folder. If using NMM, just uninstall it.

Liked this mod? You\'ll love [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16553]Harvest Overhaul - Creatures![/url]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16553-2-1336300596.jpg[/img]
author: Omeletter
